subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Kanstantin Sivtsov of Belarus won the Tour de Georgia by 4 seconds over Trent Lowe of Australia and by 14 over Levi Leipheimer of the United States. Sivtsov took the overall lead in Saturday’s climb up Brasstown Bald Mountain.
snippet: Kanstantin Sivtsov of Belarus won the Tour de Georgia by 4 seconds over Trent Lowe of Australia and by 14 over Levi Leipheimer of the United States. Sivtsov took the overall lead in Saturday’s climb up Brasstown Bald Mountain.
